game.name: Hamam: The Steaming Backrooms
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Step into Hamam — a haunting twist on the Backrooms formula. Tired of the endless yellow walls? Here, every corner is shrouded in steam, echoes, and terror. But beware: this is only the beginning... More chapters, chilling environments, and terrifying updates await with every release.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Step into Hamam — a haunting twist on the Backrooms formula. Tired of the endless yellow walls? Here, every corner is shrouded in steam, echoes, and terror. But beware: this is only the beginning... More chapters, chilling environments, and terrifying updates await with every release.
